subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: San Diego State’s Kawhi Leonard, who continues to deal with the shooting death of his father three years ago, has led the Aztecs to their first N.C.A.A. tournament victories.
snippet: San Diego State’s Kawhi Leonard, who continues to deal with the shooting death of his father three years ago, has led the Aztecs to their first N.C.A.A. tournament victories.
